beer.beer_description:
Not many breweries in New Zealand have tried to brew a Grape Ale, that complex yet very drinkable Italian style. But, well, we have an Italian brewer. Two, in fact. Which means we’ve got a fair idea of how to make one. 
The only thing is, you need fresh, unfermented grape juice. Like, fresh.

So, here it is: quite possibly the only NZ Grape Ale you’ll find this year. Sauvignon Blanc grapes, picked on Tuesday, juiced on Wednesday, dropped into the kettle on Thursday.

A clean, ample malt base, gently hopped with three wine-friendly varieties: Mosaic, Motueka, and Nelson Sauvin.

Salute!

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 65 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 14. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 180 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 37.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 160 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 33!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 160 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 33! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Crisp, clean and dry with complex and delicate stone and summerfruit flavouring, and lingering hop-tinged, floral grape notes.

user.bio: A fine beer may be judged with only one sip, but it's better to be thoroughly sure, so says Dank Eddy !

items.checkin_comment: To my uneducated palate this is a hint of grapes a hint of malt & a hint of hops

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 3 years on Untappd!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 110 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 23!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 60 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 13!
